nodes.text: The TIE Bomber Mark 2 was a proposed upgrade to the TIE/sa bomber suggested by Captain Tomax Bren after analyzing its capabilities during the Hook Nebula campaign. Among his suggestions were greater speed and maneuverability, and a less prominent profile. The design was never realized, but Grand Admiral Thrawn and Sienar Fleet Systems incorporated some of Bren's suggestions into the Scimitar assault bomber.
